text: @realDonaldTrump You fucking idiot 😁 I don’t want Biden to be the next president. I hope you will be in the White House until you lie in your beautiful coffin. Go ahead, let me see when you get coronavirus and drink your fucking disinfectant. And you died like a dog, a beautiful dog.😄
